name: britney bandana
notes:
**description**
the britney bandana is a simple garter stitch bandana with a lace & picot edging.  the pattern also includes i-cord ties and optional knitted loops to secure the piece in place using a slide comb.  this pattern is for experienced beginners.

**measurements (one size)**
length - 21.5cm / 8.5 in.
width - 38cm / 15 in.
length of ties - 28cm / 11 in.

**yarn & tension**
40g bendigo woollen mills cotton 8ply 
24 sts / 10 cm (4 in.) using 4.5mm needles.

**needles & extras**
4.5mm needles (circular or straight)
2 stitch markers
scissors / thread cutter
measuring tape
wool needle for weaving in ends

video tutorial available: https://youtu.be/lbduxvvhk5i


this is a free and untested pattern.  if i've made a mistake or you require support let me know by contacting passiveroyal@gmail.com.

  [1]: https://youtu.be/lbduxvvhk5i
